info.pavie.opennetworkmap.model.draw.network

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.pavie.opennetworkmap.model.draw.network.Layer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Spatializable

    public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Spatializable
    A layer is a spatialized grid (see FlexibleGrid) which contains Vertex objects. It allows to create diagrams from connected networks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Layer(Vertex first)
      Creates a new layer with one vertex

        Returns:
